(ROOT
  (NP
    (NP (PRP$ My) (NN appearance))
    (PP (IN with)
      (NP (NNP Adrian) (NNP Pang)))
    (PP (IN on) (`` ``)
      (NP (NNP Chasing) (NNPS Happiness))
      ('' ''))
    (. .)))


poss(appearance-2, My-1)
root(ROOT-0, appearance-2)
prep(appearance-2, with-3)
nn(Pang-5, Adrian-4)
pobj(with-3, Pang-5)
prep(appearance-2, on-6)
nn(Happiness-9, Chasing-8)
pobj(on-6, Happiness-9)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP We))
    (VP (VB discuss)
      (PP (IN about)
        (SBAR
          (WHADVP (WRB how))
          (S
            (NP (NN food))
            (VP (MD can)
              (VP (VB make)
                (S
                  (NP (PRP you))
                  (ADJP (JJ happy)))))))))
    (. !)))


nsubj(discuss-2, We-1)
root(ROOT-0, discuss-2)
prep(discuss-2, about-3)
advmod(make-7, how-4)
nsubj(make-7, food-5)
aux(make-7, can-6)
pcomp(about-3, make-7)
nsubj(happy-9, you-8)
xcomp(make-7, happy-9)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (NNP First))
    (VP (VBD aired)
      (PP (IN on)
        (NP (CD 29)))
      (NP (NNP Dec) (CD 2012)))
    (. .)))


nsubj(aired-2, First-1)
root(ROOT-0, aired-2)
prep(aired-2, on-3)
pobj(on-3, 29-4)
dobj(aired-2, Dec-5)
num(Dec-5, 2012-6)


(ROOT
  (NP
    (NP (NNS Thanks))
    (PP (TO to)
      (NP (NNP Sen)))
    (PP (IN for)
      (NP (DT the) (JJ video) (NN upload)))
    (. !)))


root(ROOT-0, Thanks-1)
prep(Thanks-1, to-2)
pobj(to-2, Sen-3)
prep(Thanks-1, for-4)
det(upload-7, the-5)
amod(upload-7, video-6)
pobj(for-4, upload-7)
